column6: This Alexa sample skill is a template for a basic fact skill. Provided a list of interesting facts about a topic, Alexa will select a fact at random and tell it to the user when the skill is invoked.
A starter hello-world serverless application

This Alexa sample skill is a template for a trivia style game with score keeping. Alexa will ask you a multiple choice questions and seek your response. Correct and Incorrect answers to questions are recorded.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS MySQL using the single user rotation scheme
Create a parameter-based skill using a template called ‘Minecraft Helper’. Ask how to craft an item in the game Minecraft, and this skill will give you instructions.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS PostgreSQL using single user rotation scheme
The Datadog log forwarder ships logs stored in S3 and CloudWatch Logs to Datadog for live search, analytics, and alerting.

This Alexa sample skill is a template for a basic fact skill.  When the skill is invoked, Alexa will select a random fact from a list of interesting facts about a topic and tell it to the user.  Python 3.6
A simple backend (read/write to DynamoDB) with a RESTful API endpoint using Amazon API Gateway.
Automated deployment toolchain used by new serverless applications created through the AWS Lambda console
Demonstrates a basic skill built with the Amazon Alexa Skills Kit.

This serverless application deploys a Lambda function and API Gateway to your AWS account that reads images from a S3 bucket (whose name defined at deployment) and serves them through API Gateway with original or desired dimensions.

This Alexa sample skill is a template for a fact skill with premium content.  When the skill is invoked, Alexa will select a random fact from the categories available to the user.  The skill allows customers to purchase access to additional categories.
Provides the basic framework for a skill adapter for a smart home skill.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS MySQL using the multiple user rotation scheme

This provides the backend Lambda functions, DynamoDB table, and IAM roles used to build a chat app using API Gateway.  See https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/announcing-websocket-apis-in-amazon-api-gateway for all the details!
Demonstrates a basic skill built with the Amazon Alexa Skills Kit.

A Lambda@Edge function that implements standard web server redirects that simplify directory handling. It handles "internal" redirects from /foo/ to /foo/index.html and "external" redirects from /foo/index.html to /foo/.
The AWS Deployment Framework (ADF) is an extensive and flexible framework to manage and deploy resources across multiple AWS accounts and regions based on AWS Organizations.
The Datadog RDS enhanced monitoring application collects granular operating system level metrics from CloudWatch logs and sends them to Datadog for alerting, dashboarding, and analyzing.

api-gateway-dev-portal is a developer portal application that allows users to register, discover, and subscribe to your API Products (via API Gateway Usage Plans), manage their API Keys, and view their usage metrics for your APIs.
Serverless web application for uploading files to S3
A started hello-world serverless application in python3
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS Oracle using the single user rotation scheme
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS PostgreSQL using the multiple user rotation scheme

This is a serverless component which sends an email to specified email addresses. Supports HTML and Text emails. Consists of an API that receives data, sends it to your Lambda function which uses SES to send the email. Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.

This is an serverless component consisting of a Lambda function, API Gateway and a DynamoDB table. Its API Gateway receives request data, sends it to your Lambda function which saves request data to a DynamoDB table. Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.

Static build of ImageMagick for Amazon Linux 2, packaged as a Lambda layer. Bundles ImageMagick 7.0.8-45.
Including convert, mogrify and identify tools and support for jpeg, gif, png, tiff and webm formats.

This is a simple Hello World Alexa skill

This tutorial will walk first-time Alexa skills developers through all the required steps involved in creating a skill using this hello world template, called ‘hello world’.
React TodoMVC with a Serverless backend
A starter hello-world serverless application in python
Demonstrates using a built-in Node.js module to make an HTTPS request.
Send log data from CloudWatch Logs and S3 to New Relic Infrastructure (Cloud Integrations) and New Relic Logging.
This connector enables Amazon Athena to communicate with Cloudwatch, making your logs accessible via SQL.
Demonstrate a Basic Lambda Welcome skill built with the ASK NodeJS SDK
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for Amazon Redshift using the single user rotation scheme
An example AWS Lambda function to index records from DynamoDB to ElasticSearch.
Static build of FFmpeg/FFprobe for Amazon Linux 2, packaged as a Lambda layer. Bundles FFmpeg 4.1.3
HelloWorld Lambda function template for Application Load Balancer Lambda as target

The AWS Serverless application package contains a set of common Lambda functions to be used by Amazon Connect to interact with Salesforce, allowing lookup, create and update operations for different Salesforce objects, like Contacts and Cases.
Sample application for generating a response from viewer-request trigger implemented in NodeJS.
This is a dynamic s3 website which uses API gateway and Lambda to scan a Dynamodb Table and displays in tabular format.
This solution creates resources for processing and sending Amazon GuardDuty Events to Sumo logic.

Protect downloads of your content hosted on CloudFront with Cognito authentication using Lambda@Edge. Includes: S3 Bucket w. sample SPA, Cognito User Pool with hosted UI set up, Lambda@Edge functions to validate JWT's and handle OAuth2 redirects.
A getting started application to deploy an API with API Gateway and a Lambda written in Go.
Creates a templated lambda to be used by AWS SecretsManager for secret rotation
Used in episode 3 of "Alexa Devs" - a series to learn how to develop alexa skills

Selenium on PhantomJS. In fact - a ready-made tool for web scraping. For example, the demo parses a random page in Wikipedia and sends its header. (PhantomJS at the same time disguises as a normal browser, knows how to log in, click and fill out forms)

This is a S3 Lambda that listens to an event when a file is stored in a S3 Bucket. It then saves information about the stored file in a DynamoDB table.
Written in Node.js. It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
Posts messages to a Slack channel.
Uses ImageMagick to perform simple image processing operations, such as resizing.
Serverless application that sends CloudWatch alarm notifications to Slack on an Amazon SNS trigger
This connector enables Amazon Athena to communicate with DynamoDB, making your tables accessible via SQL.
Automatically uncompresses (or decompresses) files uploaded to selected S3 bucket!

Thanks to this application, you will be to quickly generate your own serverless survey. Just fill out configuration file with questions which should be part of the survey and save your app. In just a few seconds, your survey will be available!
A sample hello world Lambda application written in Go, using eawsy/aws-lambda-go-shim.
An Amazon S3 trigger that retrieves metadata for the object that has been updated.
Periodically polls an SQS queue and asynchronously consumes each message.
A simple mobile backend (read/write to DynamoDB).
Tesseract is OCR recognition library which allows to get text from given image.

Damn Vulnerable Serverless Application (DVSA) is a deliberately vulnerable app made to help serverless security professionals and developers, better understand the processes and implications of serverless security in a legal, controlled environment.
A sample application for API Gateway custom authorizers, implemented in NodeJS.

Need a "contact us" form on your static website?  

This template uses API Gateway, Lambda, and SNS to create a Serverless "contact us" form for your static website.
An Amazon Cognito user pool, pre-configured with AWS Lambda triggers to implement passwordless e-mail auth
This component creates an API Gateway endpoint that is linked to a Lambda function that returns HTML (i.e. page can be viewed in a web browser)
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS SQL Server using the single user rotation scheme
Alexa responds with the count and anagrams for a requested word

Authenticate your users through Cognito, Lambda and API Gateway. The script will set a local cookie in the browser and prompt for reauthentication by the user if needed. 

More information; https://github.com/marekq/serverless-cognito
OWASP ServerlessGoat is a deliberately insecure realistic AWS Lambda serverless application, maintained by OWASP and initially created by PureSec.
An Amazon SNS trigger that logs the message pushed to the SNS topic.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for MongoDB using the single user rotation scheme
Example of sending metrics from NodeJs Lambda using SignalFx Wrapper to SignalFx in real-time.

This is a serverless little game sample.
You can play games with two players via different browsers.
It uses that the temporary data is held within the time-out period.
A simple backend (read/write to DynamoDB) with a RESTful API endpoint using Amazon API Gateway.
This connector enables Amazon Athena to communicate with your Database instance(s) using JDBC driver.
A Serverless Application that creates Lambda function to use as an authorizer in Amazon API Gateway for HTTP Basic Auth and a DynamoDB tables for users.
Post notifications to Slack when Code Pipeline Events occur
Lambda NodeJS Lightsail Backup. Automatic backups/snapshots for AWS Lightsail
This serverless app turns a twitter search query into an AWS Lambda event source by invoking a given lambda function to process tweets found by search.
Amplify passwordless SMS authentication backend using Amazon Cognito user pools custom auth challenge flow with AWS Lambda triggers.
A simple backend (read/write to DynamoDB) with a RESTful API endpoint using Amazon API Gateway.
Generate thumbnails for images uploaded to S3
This is a sample implementation for the concepts described in the AWS blog post "Analyzing your Amazon CloudFront access logs at scale".
Serverless Magic 8-Ball is serverless version of fortune-telling / seeking advice toy. If you will deploy it, you will never have problem to quickly make a live changing decision!

This is a serverless component consisting of an API Gateway with a GET method, which sends a request to a Lambda function retrieves (gets) all items from an existing DynamoDB table. 
Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.
Sample application for returning HTTP redirect implemented in NodeJS.

This is a Lambda function that updates an item in the DynamoDB database, based on the API Gateway request data. 
Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.
It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
Used in episode 4 of "Alexa Devs" - a series to learn how to develop alexa skills

This utility app provides a custom resource that allows an SNS Topic Subscription's filter policy to be specified as a JSON string instead of a JSON object so it can be passed into apps as a template parameter.
Run new and existing Selenium Webdriver scripts written in Javascript with the headless chromium browser.
An Amazon S3 trigger that retrieves metadata for the object that has been updated.
A lambda function to run cfn_nag as an action in CodePipeline
A Lambda function that converts street addresses to geo-coordinates and vice-versa with geocoding, including landmarks, and reverse geocoding using HERE Location Services.
Book details of a visit, using Amazon Lex to perform natural language understanding

This is a Lambda function that receives an API Gateway request and retrieves (gets) one item from an existing DynamoDB table. 

Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.

This function is a function to stop the EC2 instance.
After deployment, CloudWatch Events is set.
Please set IAM police.
Simple dashboard built for viewing pipeline metrics in AWS.
Lambda Layer for AWS CLI
An Amazon S3 trigger that uses rekognition APIs to detect faces

lex-dynamodb demonstrates how a Lex fulfillment Lambda function can use DynamoDB for persistence to record the intent text, request attributes, and session attributes.

Deploy using the AWS SAM CLI utility or from the AWS Serverless Apps Repository.
Pre-labeling and Post-labeling task lambdas to use in custom SageMaker Ground Truth labeling jobs
An Amazon SNS trigger that logs the message pushed to the SNS topic.

This sample Alexa skill demonstrates how to build an Alexa private skill that integrates with your Salesforce data, utilizing account linking and a personal voice code. Once you've linked an account, you can find and modify your sales opportunities.
An Amazon S3 trigger that retrieves metadata for the object that has been updated.
This is a Hello World example of the WorkMail Lambda feature. For more information see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/workmail/latest/adminguide/lambda.html
Selenium on Headless Chromium on Python 3.6. In fact - a ready-made tool for web scraping and load testing. For example, the demo parses a random page in Wikipedia and sends its header.
A basic python based back-end for an Alexa skill that randomly gives you an open restaurant in a specified city using the Yelp API.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for RDS Oracle using the multiple user rotation scheme
Cron job for deleting old, unused versions of Lambda functions to clean up storage space
Copy and resize images using Lambda.
PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, EPUB generator. Enables to create/modify custom microsoft office documents + PDFs and books. Example code in the repo generates example of each of the document mentioned.
Sample application for modifying CloudFront response header implemented in NodeJS.
Package for fans of statistics, data scientists and data engineers. RAM at lambda is 1.5 gigabytes, and the maximum operating time - 5 minutes. I am sure that will be enough for most tasks.
This lambda function store SQS messages from a particular queue into a dynamodb table. The table has to be created previously.
This AWS Event Fork Pipelines app backs up events from the given Amazon SNS topic to an Amazon S3 bucket, using an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose stream.
The Serverless S3 Uploader allows you to upload JPG files to Amazon S3 buckets from your web applications using pre-signed URLs.
Stream events from AWS Kinesis Stream to Splunk HTTP Event Collector (HEC).

This is a S3 Lambda that listens to an event when a file is stored in a S3 Bucket. Then it publishes a message to a SNS topic with the S3 event data.
Written in Node.js. It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
Subscribes new and existing CloudWatch log groups to Lambda/Kinesis/Firehose by ARN.
An Amazon DynamoDB trigger that logs the updates made to a table.
Lambda function to generate a pre-signed url for a S3 object
This AWS Event Fork Pipelines app buffers events from the given Amazon SNS topic into an Amazon SQS queue, so it can replay these events back to another pipeline, in a disaster recovery scenario.
This AWS Lambda function allows you to delete the old Elasticsearch indexes using SigV4Auth authentication

Serverless function that charges a Stripe account based on the API Gateway request data. Supports payment capture / refund / charge. Supports CORS. Written in Node.js.
It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.
Code base for basic Hello World chatbot based on AWS Lex service and AWS Lambda
This serverless app periodically polls a given SQS queue and invokes a given lambda function to process messages.
Performs a periodic check of the given site, erroring out on test failure.
Serverless url shortener

Publishes tweet sentiment analysis metrics for the given Twitter search.
This AWS Event Fork Pipelines app indexes events from the given Amazon SNS topic into an Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain for search and analytics, using an Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose stream.
Conducts an AWS SecretsManager secret rotation for Amazon Redshift using the multi user rotation scheme

Tensorflow 1.4 (Keras included) on AWS Lambda.

Open source library for Machine Intelligence. Using tensorflow on lambda is not as bad as it may sound - for some simple models it is the simplest and the cheapest way to deploy.
AWS Lambda Layer for kubectl for Amazon EKS

This is a Lambda that publishes API Gateway request data to an SNS Topic. 
Written in Node.js. 

It's a basic Nuts & Bolts serverless application component.

This example shows how to leverage Amazon Rekognition's image moderation feature to automatically remove messages containing explicit or suggestive images from channels of popular chat apps using Amazon API Gateway, AWS Lambda, and Amazon Rekognition.
An Amazon SES notification handler for processing bounces, complaints and deliveries.

The Serverless Form Handler accepts a form submission from a web page via API Gateway, saving the data to a DynamoDB table and sending an email via SES. This application configures the AWS services to collect the form data from the submission.
Sends an SNS message from input JSON
Collect and store crypto currency prices of the top 200 coins according to market cap. Alert yourself if one of your coins is changing price significantly.

Train and run a Machine Learning model to predict the quality of your red wine. This app aims at showcasing how to train a regression model with Scikit Learn on Lambda, and then use the model to do predictions still on Lambda.
AWS Step Functions state machine to optimize Lambda functions

Create a static website with CloudFormation and SAM with S3.

This template create a bucket and bucket with www to redirect to the master bucket.
Serverless Chrome/Chromium Layer
This solution consists of a lambda function which which gets triggered by CloudWatch events with findings as payload which are then ingested to Sumo Logic via S3 source
CloudFormation custom resource for invoking a Lambda function during deployment
A simple function that sends logs & events to Splunk HTTP Event Collector (HEC).
Triggered by an AWS SNS notification that their IP blocks have been updated, this function will automatically update your Security Groups with specific tags.
Serverless photo gallery

Create a serverless podcast service using Amazon S3 for storage of music files and Lambda for generation of the podcast feed. The Lambda function can run periodically to add/remove podcast files from the S3 bucket containing your music.
This checkout pipeline is meant to be nested in the example e-commerce application that demonstrates the AWS Event Fork Pipelines apps.
A function that handles a Slack slash command and echoes the details back to the user.
This is a SNS Lambda subscriber that stores notification data into a DynamoDB table. Written in Node.js. It's a Nuts & Bolts serverless application component
This solution consists of a lambda functions which is used to fetch logs from Slack and ingest to Sumo Logic.
This sample demonstrates the use of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB and API Gateway to implement a simple contact us form for a static web site.
This serverless application is an example of using the AWS Event Fork Pipelines apps in an e-commerce use case.
Serverless application that forwards AWS CloudWatch logs to the Timber.io logging service.
The Datadog VPC flow log application captures flow log data from CloudWatch logs, parses out metrics and tags, ands sends it to Datadog for alerting, dashboarding, and analyzing.

Query Twitter, which sends tweets to Kinesis Firehose to stream into a data source (eg S3) for query aggregations. Foundational setup of popular self-paced Voice Powered Analytics workshop https://github.com/awslabs/voice-powered-analytics
Microsoft Word doc/docx to PDF conversion, using S3 buckets
Schedule a dentist appointment, using Amazon Lex to perform natural language understanding

This Alexa skill template help developer to build dynamic content that can be totally controlled by data saved in DynamoDB. After publishing, developer can modify the skill content and behavior through the database.
Replicates S3 objects to configured buckets
A function that handles a Slack slash command and echoes the details back to the user.

App that can recognize who is on the photo! Create a collection by uploading photos of people you want to recognize and then use the web-app to check who is on the picture (you can use your mobile phone's camera!)

Monitor S3 Bucket, on image upload, Lambda Function detect labels, moderation labels  and text in the updated/created image using AWS rekognition API and publish labels and texts on the SNS Topic. Based on Python3.6

A sample application for API Gateway custom authorizers, implemented in Python 2.7.

WhatisMyIP Lambda function template for Application Load Balancer Lambda as target
This serverless app creates publicly accessible links to PR build logs for a given AWS CodeBuild project and posts them as a comment on the corresponding GitHub PR.
A lambda function to give insights into real-time weather forecasts, alerts, and astronomical info for any location.
An example project to monitor Java lambda functions via Thundra. You just need to create an API key from Thundra and see the rest!
Filters CloudWatch logs and publishes them to another lamdba function

Demonstrates basic handling of a Slack slash command by responding to questions from users.  Sets up a new '/Hodor' Slack Slash Command:

/Hodor what is the meaning of life?
A function that implements standard webserver redirects for when using the S3 REST API endpoint as an origin for a CloudFront distribution.

This is a Lambda function that deletes an Item from a DynamoDB Table based on the API Gateway request. Supports CORS. Written in Node.js. It's a Nuts & Bolts application component for AWS Serverless Application Repository.

Written in Node.js.

An Amazon SES notification handler for processing bounces, complaints and deliveries to upload to an Amazon S3 bucket.

This skill demonstrates how to build a private Alexa skill to access Salesforce data. This skill identifies a given opportunity, tracks a series of statements that a user gives, and posts those either as a note or as a Chatter post.
Merge artifacts in AWS CodePipeline into a single artifact using AWS Lambda.
Send a link to a random dog picture to a phone number daily, via AWS Lambda and SNS.
A real-time consumer of log events ingested by Amazon CloudWatch Logs

This serverless application publishes applications to AWS Serverless Application Repository. This app creates a Lambda function that a user could then use as an Invoke action target in their CodePipeline.
This service provides a bridge between AWS IoT and Twilio for your devices to send messages to Twillio.
Extract all tags from your AWS account into a S3 file. Query tags file with SQL.

- Understands fuzzy queries with streets and locations, and gives the number of free bikes.
- Gives Bike Facts
- Works in most major US cities.
Deploy this function to your DeepLens and use with Smarter Camera (https://smarter.camera) to track people in video you capture.
vocal warm up skill using audio player
Sample application for generating a redirect response based on the viewer country. Triggered by an origin-request. Implemented in NodeJS.

[prod] AWS CMS Portal solution to get you started with AWS. Integrate with Lambda, Cognito, DynamoDB, AppSync and API Gateway to provide an easy to start serverless solution.
The solution is made to be cost effective, highly secure, and very scalable.

Package of image processing tools, and not only to style image, but also a large set of Computer vision algorithms. Contains OpenCV and Pillow.
This Lambda function will create a CloudWatch event rule which will be triggered as soon as a Docker image is pushed to ECR and deploys it automatically to a ECS Cluster.

A serverless app that periodically polls the public Twitter API with a predefined search query and invokes a given lambda function to process new tweets.

Lambda pack for load testing APIs and websites. Contains WRK (https://github.com/wg/wrk) and pyresttest (https://github.com/svanoort/pyresttest) libraries. WRK is useful for producing high loads. Pyresttest is useful for API workflow testing.
A lambda function to find (search for name, type, category), discover (look into address, contact info) and interact with POI information (enable user reviews, photos).
Blueprint for generating and manipulating graphics using node-canvas, a Cairo backed Canvas implementation for NodeJS by Automattic.

A simple API access manager built on AWS lambda to provide multi tiered access to salesforce services with a single API user. Please read more here: https://github.com/manjit5190/Salesforce-API-Access-Manager-Monitor-Logger/blob/master/README.md
Sample application for generating a response from origin-request trigger implemented in NodeJS.
Sample application for redirecting unauthenticated users to sign-in page; triggered by CloudFront viewer-request event.

This solution is great to create your own Fargate, SOC or PCI Compliance with containers

Debug, profile, & monitor Lambda functions!

Integrate IOpipe from the Lambda console or Cloud9.

Register for a project token at www.iopipe.com. Set env var IOPIPE_TOKEN to enable reporting!
A serverless API that converts CloudFormation templates between JSON and YAML formats.
Perform healthchecks on private IP or private FQDN (Private Route53). Healthchecks status are pushed to Cloudwatch custom metrics.
A lambda function to get access to pre-rendered map images already optimized for desktop and mobile devices.

Error tracking in the cloud. Free and opensource, tightly integrated with AWS. Capture client-side errors and exceptions, save to S3 for later analysis with Athena, query using ElasticSearch, publish to CloudWatch metrics for easy alerts and notifications.
Use Inception5 model to label Images using TensorFlow in Java.

Alexa Skill Template with clean code (eslint, sonar), testing (unit tests, e2e), multi-languge and Alexa Presentation Language (APL).

Use "ask" locally to run unit/e2e tests, eslint, sonar & debug. +info: https://github.com/javichur/
A simple site generator that transforms Markdown into HTML.
Send a daily headline from reddit via SMS.
A lambda function to provide precise instructions to a destination using various transport modes (car, truck, public transit, bicycle) and leveraging different algorithms (matrix, isoline routing).
Publish a Slack API chat.postMessage message received from SNS to Slack.  Combine this with a new application to start posting messages from that application to Slack.
Easy handling of Step Function tokens as callback URLs

Simple React web app that broadcasts messages to multiple clients using Serverless GraphQL real-time subscriptions powered by AWS AppSync. You can easily host the web app on S3 using the Amplify CLI or Amplify Console (refer to instructions).
An Amazon Cognito Sync trigger that modifies Cognito datasets based on the incoming event.
AWS Lambda Layer providing SDK for AWS Data Exchange. Support Python 3.7 and Boto3.

An Amazon Kinesis Analytics record pre-processor that receives JSON or CSV records as input and returns them with a processing status. Use this processor as a starting point for custom transformation logic.
Static build of Pandoc for Amazon Linux 2, packaged as a Lambda layer. Bundles Pandoc 2.7.2.
This application creates a backend service using serverless technologies such as API Gateway, Lambda etc.

Welcome to Amazon Connect Serverless Hook for Contextual Messages

The sample code helps get you started with a simple web service integration hook deployed by AWS CloudFormation between Amazon Connect and AWS Lambda with Dynamo DB.
